Name: Antananarivo
Description: The capital region, home to Antananarivo, the political and economic heart of Madagascar.

Name: Fianarantsoa
Description: Known for its scenic landscapes, tea plantations, and historical importance.

Name: Toamasina
Description: A coastal region known for its port city, Toamasina, which is the main harbor of Madagascar.

Name: Mahajanga
Description: Located on the northwest coast, known for its rich natural resources and maritime activities.

Name: Toliara
Description: A region in the southwestern part of Madagascar, known for its biodiversity and beautiful beaches.

Name: Antsiranana
Description: A region in the northernmost part of Madagascar, known for its diverse ecosystems and marine life.

Name: Vakinankaratra
Description: Located in the central highlands, known for its agriculture, particularly in coffee and vegetables.

Name: Atsinanana
Description: A region on the eastern side of Madagascar, known for its lush rainforests and wildlife.

Name: Androy
Description: A southern region known for its arid landscapes and distinct cultural heritage.

Name: Menabe
Description: A western region known for its savannah, unique wildlife, and the famous Avenue of the Baobabs.
